location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Farish, Secretary to the Government, Bombay, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter encloses a report, dated 8 April 1813, submitted by native silk merchants, regarding the raw silk consigned by Bruce to Bombay. Farish requests that Bruce discontinues his purchases of the silk, on the grounds that the silk is of inferior quality.
